name: Dreaming (itch)
description:
A simple adventure game made for NOKIA 3310 JAM 2. The concept of the game is pretty simple, just look around the map for key items and switchs so you can progress and fight the bosses.

 Everything on the game was made from scratch by 2 persons  since the start of the JAM.

 You have 2 executables, and of them is just a upscaled version of the game, which you can see everything in 2x. We recommend playing the upscaled version, since it's easier to read dialogues and to see everything that is going on screen.

Commands:

X - Attack

C - Roll

Arrows - Movement

Esc - Exit Game

 Thanks.
